#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		long int c,q,r;
		q=n/7;
		r=n%7;
		if(r==0||r==4)
		c=7*q;
		else if(r==1||r==5)
		c=7*(q-1);
		else if(r==2||r==6)
		c=7*(q-2);
		else
		c=7*(q-3);
		
		if(c<0)
		cout<<-1<<endl;
		else
		cout<<c<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
